review:
I strongly recommend the doctor
She completely understand the problem of patient and even make the patient comfortable
Doesn't exaggerate the things, doesn't scare the patient
Talk less but always sounds logical
Did very smooth delivery even in just 20 mins 
and i was like i was scared of this moment for whole 9 months and it went just like a blink.
*** ** *** ************

review:
Dr. Anupama gupta is an excellent doctor as well as she is very nice human being..I knw her from last nine years n I m fully satisfied with her treatment I never consult any other doctor other than her for me...
 lots of well wishes for her..thank u so much mam.

I recently visited doctor Anupama for a gynecologic consultation and was extremely disappointed with the experience. The doctor was quite rude and dismissive during our conversation, making me feel uncomfortable and undervalued as a patient. Additionally, she failed to provide clear and thorough information about my condition and treatment plan. She did not explain the medication consumption schedule properly, leaving me confused about when and how to take my prescribed medicine. ** **** ******* ****** her fees were exorbitantly high, especially considering the subpar level of care and service I received. I would not recommend doctor Anupama Gupta to anyone seeking compassionate and professional gynecologic care.

*** ** **** **** ****** my wife get cesarean from her in santom hospital and she treated her very well i recommend her to everyone bcoz when i visited to the nearest maternity clinics to remove the stiches they said the doctor allign the stiches very well and smartly. 
Thank you doctor if you are reading this you have taken our case in this crisis of corona.

*** ** *** **** *** ** *** **** ***** ** ****. Anupama maa'am, if ur reading this, u have been such a support during our difficult pregnancy. we really owe u big time. thankyou souch for all your support
Dr Anupma Gupta understands the problem well while giving substantial amount of time. Dr makes the patient feel comfortable by being patient.

********* ** ***** *** ** *** **** ************ her nature her behavior with patients.... Is very good.... 
She made me feel so good during my labor pain & delivery... The all over process of my delivery was fantastic under her observation
